source.3170782c:
def moving_average(a, n=3) :
    ret = np.cumsum(a, dtype=float)
    ret[n:] = ret[n:] - ret[:-n]
    return ret[n - 1:] / n

np.random.seed(100)
Z = np.random.randint(10, size=10)
print('array: ', Z)
moving_average(Z, n=3).round(2)

Two = np.array([[15 ,16, 17], [4 ,7, 1]])

   num[...] = num*num
